title: 报错问题
author: 月熊
txt_content:
[00:44:39] [Netty Server IO #1/WARN] [io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelPipeline]:
An exception was thrown by a user handler's exceptionCaught() method while handl
ing the following exception:
io.netty.handler.timeout.ReadTimeoutException
出现这个报错后客户端提示每次进服务器不超过五分钟后就会被弹出提示Disconnected

replies.author: dogeop
replies.txt_content: 客户端网络问题，明显写了read timeout，此贴终结

replies.author: 月熊
replies.txt_content:
dogeop 发表于 2017-8-23 02:12
客户端网络问题，明显写了read timeout，此贴终结
那是服务器的提示 出了那个提示 客户端就会自动退出服务器

replies.author: dogeop
replies.txt_content: 服务器read客户端的超时也会导致断开和客户端的连接，还是中间网络的问题，可能是这个玩家到服务器的线路不够好
